mapper.select: SELECT * FROM users where 1=1 and username = #{username}
SELECT id, category, name, cost, case onsale when 'Y' then FLOOR(cost * 0.9) else cost end R_price, num, onsale, src FROM ecommerce.product;

WITH mc AS ( SELECT p.id, p.name, CASE WHEN p.onsale = 'Y' THEN FLOOR(p.cost * 0.9) ELSE p.cost end cost, c.num, p.onsale, p.src FROM users u INNER JOIN cart c ON u.id = c.userid INNER JOIN product p ON c.productid = p.id WHERE u.id = #{userId} ), total AS ( SELECT floor( sum(cost * num) ) total FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN p.onsale = 'Y' THEN FLOOR(p.cost * 0.9) ELSE p.cost end cost, c.num FROM users u INNER JOIN cart c ON u.id = c.userid INNER JOIN product p ON c.productid = p.id WHERE u.id = #{userId} ) m ) SELECT mc.id, mc.name, CONCAT('$', mc.cost) cost, mc.num, mc.onsale, mc.src, CONCAT('$', total) total FROM mc LEFT JOIN total ON 1 = 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart (UserId, ProductId, num) VALUES (#{userId}, #{pid}, #{num})
mapper.update: UPDATE cart m INNER JOIN cart c ON c.userid = #{userId} AND c.productid = #{pid} SET m.num = (c.num + 1) WHERE c.id = m.id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO records (PKNO, UserId, username, pId, pname, num, price, onsale_mk) (SELECT #{date} PKNO, a.UserId, b.username, a.ProductId pId, c.`name`, a.num, CASE c.onsale WHEN 'Y' THEN ROUND(c.cost * 0.9, 0) WHEN 'N' THEN c.cost END price, c.onsale FROM cart a INNER JOIN users b ON a.UserId = b.id INNER JOIN product c ON a.ProductId = c.id WHERE UserId = #{userId} )
